EmailTemplate.name: EXTERNAL_3M Privacy Filters and Screen Protectors
EmailTemplate.subject: Protect Private Healthcare Information
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Healthcare
Protect Private Healthcare Information 3M™ Privacy Filters and Screen Protectors help protect PHI and other confidential information on monitors, laptops, tablets, and smartphones. They are an easy-to-implement solution to help strengthen compliance with privacy regulations, such as HIPAA.
3M™ Framed LCD Black Privacy Filters
3M™ Frameless LCD Black Privacy Filters
3M™ Easy-On Privacy Filters for Tablets
3M™ Privacy Screen Protectors for Smartphones
Valid at business.officedepot.com or by phone at 888.2.OFFICE and fax at 888.813.7272 only. Offers are non-trasferable. Office Depot reserves the right to limit quantities sold to each customer. We are not responsible for errors. 3M is a trademark of 3M. © 3M 2014. All rights reserved.
